channel.title: Saving problems
channel.description:
Alright I made a clan and I had some errors when I tried to save it to a moreinfo file then finally fixed it. But now I have another problem when it saves it saves without an = sign... like it says
[code]InmyKlan 1[/code]
instead of
[code]InmyKlan = 1[/code]
any help? thanks :D
